sen.j: 河原崎 権三郎（かわらさき ごんざぶろう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Gonzaburo KAWARASAKI is a hereditary family name for an actor of Kabuki, a Japanese traditional theatrical drama.
Gonzaburo KAWARASAKI is a hereditary family name for an actor of Kabuki, a Japanese traditional theatrical drama.

sen.j: - 生没年不詳の為代外される場合もある。
sen.e: - As his dates are unknown, he is sometimes excluded from the family tree.

sen.j: - 後の河原崎権十郎 (2代目)。

sen.e: - the eldest son of Gonzaburo KAWARASAKI (II)

tit.j: 河原崎権三郎 (4代目)※3代目とも
